body_html:
Thanks for your time. I have one question.

I will train a CNN1 using extracted depth features and freeze a graph. Then I will do an bicubic interpolation with disparity map in images using SciPy. Later, I use that warped images to train a CNN2 with tensorflow. Will auto-differentiation work in this case ?

I read that tensorflow follows static graph construction. So probably it works only in an end to end training. (Not sure ! )

I read that tensorflow follows static graph construction. So probably it works only in an end to end training. (Not sure ! )
body:
Thanks for your time. I have one question.

I will train a CNN1 using extracted depth features and freeze a graph. Then I will do an bicubic interpolation with disparity map in images using SciPy. Later, I use that warped images to train a CNN2 with tensorflow. Will auto-differentiation work in this case ? 

I read that tensorflow follows static graph construction. So probably it works only in an end to end training. (Not sure ! )
